message.description: A longer description of the error YYY
message.example: Event with provided id: aaaaaaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddd-0123456789ab was not found

account_id.description: The NEXMO_API_KEY of the Vonage API account that the audit event is associated with.

context.description: A valid JSON object with information detailing the context of the audit event.

created_at.description: When the audit event was created.

event_type_description.description: A description of the event type

source.description:
The source of the event.
CD: Customer Dashboard DEVAPI: via Developer API

source_country.description: ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code recorded for the event.

source_description.description: Description of the audit event source.
source_description.format: A human readable description of the `source`.

source_ip.description: The IP address used to make the account change.

user_email.description: Email of the user whose account the audit event is associated with.

user_id.description: The ID of the user that the audit event is associated with.
